com.nutiteq.projections
Class Projection

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.projections.Projection
Direct Known Subclasses:
EPSG3857, EPSG4326
public abstract class Projection
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract base class for all projections.

public Projection()
Method Detail

getBounds

public abstract Bounds getBounds()
Get bounds of this projection.

Returns:
projection bounds specified when projection was constructed.

fromWgs84

public abstract MapPos fromWgs84(double lon,
                                 double lat)
Transform point represented in WGS84 coordinates to coordinate system of current projection.

Parameters:
lon - longitude in WGS84 system (-180..180)
lat - latitude in WGS84 system (-90..90)
Returns:
point coordinates in the coordinate system of current projection

toWgs84

public abstract MapPos toWgs84(double x,
                               double y)
Transform point in coordinate system of this projection to WGS84 coordinate system.

Parameters:
x - first coordinate
y - second coordinate
Returns:
point coordinates in WGS84 coordinate system

name

public abstract java.lang.String name()
Get name of the projection, usually "EPSG:xxxx". Should be redefined by each actual projection!

Returns:
name of the projection
